definitions.definition: The (often spherical) end of the head of a hammer opposite the main hammering end.
To shape metal by striking it, especially with a peen.
The male reproductive organ used for sexual intercourse that in the human male and some other mammals is also used for urination; the tubular portion of the male genitalia (excluding the scrotum).
definitions.example: The female clitoris is homologous to the male penis.
